Container.Name: llm-council
Container.Overview: LLM Council - A 3-stage deliberation system where multiple LLMs collaboratively answer questions. Features anonymized peer review to prevent bias.
Container.Description:
LLM Council is a 3-stage deliberation system: 1. Stage 1: Multiple LLMs independently respond to your question 2. Stage 2: Models anonymously rank each other's responses 3. Stage 3: A chairman synthesizes the best answer
Requires an OpenRouter API key. Optional Groq API key for voice transcription.

Config.Name: OpenRouter API Key
Config.Description: REQUIRED: Your OpenRouter API key (get from openrouter.ai)

Config.Name: Groq API Key
Config.Description: OPTIONAL: Groq API key for voice transcription (get from groq.com)
